WorkItem.Description:
Could be of interest to add an Event tab similar to the One in the Warlock module.
Here events in the rotation could be listed with the timings. At the top a summary of the number of shots fired could be listed. (similar to what is done if the debug option is set to true in code).
Â 
However, this would need to be called only once, and not as in "debug mode"... every time an item's/talent's/buff's dps is calculated

Comments.Message: Will post this as a patch.
Drizz: I added your patch as submitted would you please post another one based on current code that adds the functionality? Right now it's just interface.

Donwloaded the 39680 code base, but can't get it to compile/run.

Get's the following"Could not load file or assembly 'Rawr.Base, Version=2.2.27.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null' or one of its dependencies. The system cannot find the file specified." in Program.cs line 27
Do a fresh checkout, I haven't added or removed any files
Submitted one file. It's based on the 39705 release.

Oh, you might wanna make the text boxes a little more narrow. The scrollbar get's clipped when boxes fills with text.
Also if it is possible to make the bottom textbox's height kind of resize as you change the height of the Rawr window that would be great. Otherwize you end up with a "scrolbar in a scrolled window".
